title: (x) "SÃ¼ddeutsche Zeitung" German newspaper nameplate - hand drawn {Ralf Herrmann}
author: bojev

comments.content: This is somewhat similar to the faces by [Herbert Post](http://web.archive.org/web/20110616165541/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/person/post/herbert/).

It's an old hand-drawn logotype. You cannot buy or download it anywhere.

Ralf
Thanks Ralf, That was my first thought but I liked it enough to check.
